results.title: Marked suppression of ventilation while awake following massive ingestion of atenolol.
results.text_hl: Although we are unable to prove a causal relationship, future @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ @DISEASE_Drug_Overdose @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@ should be observed carefully for @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@ventilatory failure@@@, even if fully conscious.

results.title: Hemodynamic effects of nifedipine given alone and in combination with atenolol in patients with impaired left ventricular function.
results.text_hl: Chronic oral administration of @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ precipitated @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@LV failure@@@ only in those with the lowest EF and highest LVEDP; usually @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@LV failure@@@ was present with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ alone.

citations.NLM: de Buitleir M, Rowland E, Krikler DM. Hemodynamic effects of nifedipine given alone and in combination with atenolol in patients with impaired left ventricular function. Am J Cardiol. 1985 May 17;55(12):15E-20E. PMID: 4003284

results.title: Calcium channel blockers versus other antihypertensive therapies on progression of NIDDM associated nephropathy.
results.text_hl: Therefore, in persons with @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal insufficiency@@@ secondary to @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@NIDDM@@@, similar levels of blood pressure control with either @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ or NDCCBs slowed progression of @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal disease@@@ to a greater extent than @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.
